summary: In 1500s England, a cruel witch-hunting magistrate, who often tortures innocent villagers for his entertainment, runs afoul of a witch who conjures a banshee to kill the magistrate and his family.
cast: Vincent Price|Essy Persson|Hilary Heath|Carl Rigg|Stephan Chase|Marshall Jones|Andrew McCulloch|Michael Elphick|Pamela Moiseiwitsch|Joyce Mandre|Robert Hutton|Guy Deghy|Elisabeth Bergner|Patrick Mower|Victoria Fairbrother|Quinn O'Hara|Jane Deady|Hugh Griffith|Jan Rossini|Sally Geeson|Godfrey James|Gertan Klauber|Peter Benson|Richard Everett|Louis Selwyn|Micky Baker|Carol Desmond|Ann Barrass|Nancy Meckler|Hugh Portnow|Stephen Rea|Maurice Colbourne|Dinah Stabb|Tony Sibbald|Neil Johnston|Rowan Wylie|Tim Thomas|Ron Sahewk|Maya Roth|Philippa Howell|Guy Pierce|Harry Fielder|Terry Martin|George Oliver|Dido Plumb|John Tatham|Fred Wood
keywords: murder of a nude woman|female nudity|chariot|priest|coffin
title: El grito del fantasma
